item.description: By the time of this meeting, I expect we'll be actually into the investigation of Central Wave's apparent activity, so I'd rather not hold the monthly meeting there (more specifics regarding the investigation forthcoming). I am open to ideas for new locations to hold the monthly, and I'm leaning towards doing an Asian buffet somewhere, probably Durham or Portsmouth. Suggestions?
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the corner opposite the door, and will leave a message with the greeter.
item.name: The Seacoast Paranormal Research Group January Meetup
